pullrequest.title: bitbucket-pipelines.yml: test default on bionic so ign-cmake2 is available

content.raw:
I merged this because https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/650 was planning to only install ign-cmake2, so this would enable the ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto job to work on bionic instead of xenial. I forgot about the ci-default-xenial job though:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_plugin-ci-default-xenial-amd64&build=18)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_plugin-ci-default-xenial-amd64/18/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_plugin-ci-default-xenial-amd64/18/

so I changed the release-tools to install both cmake1 and cmake2

* https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/658

so we could revert this, but it doesn't seem like a big deal to me to have it like this
content.html:
I merged this because https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/650 was planning to only install ign-cmake2, so this would enable the ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto job to work on bionic instead of xenial. I forgot about the ci-default-xenial job though:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_plugin-ci-default-xenial-amd64/18/

so I changed the release-tools to install both cmake1 and cmake2

  • https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/658

so we could revert this, but it doesn't seem like a big deal to me to have it like this
